DOC.brief_summary: This phase I/II study highly select donor lymphocyte infusion patient undergo HLA-haploidentical hemopoietic stem cell transplantation . Patients offer `` pre-emptive '' NK-DLI early HSCT . Three schedule NK-cell infusion study : Basel patient ( adult pediatric ) receive NK-DLI day +40 +100 ( pre-emptive-late ) ; Frankfurt patient ( pediatric ) receive NK-DLI day +3 , +40 , +100 ( pre-emptive early ) . Patients receive pre-emptive NK-DLI loss donor chimerism evidence minimal residual disease offer `` therapeutic '' NK-DLI .
